Title: Surprise! Goku Is Ginyu and Ginyu Is Goku?!
Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Plot: Gohan and Krillin unearth the Dragon Balls, but their attempts to summon Shenron fail miserably. Later, Cpt. Ginyu's devious strategy forces Earth's warriors to do the unthinkable: attack Goku's flesh and bones with chilling feroc...
